languages.text:
Осколочный карабин извергает струю кристаллических снарядов, что с воем рвутся в плоти Жертвы и вокруг нее. Смертоносная режущая метель украшает улицу кровавым снегом, тела случайных прохожих, угодивших под огонь, валятся наземь. Обычное дело, так живут на шпилях.
Все вокруг разбегаются подальше от размеченного мной поля смерти. Жертва припадает к полу, но еще жива. Я и не ожидал, что первый выстрел станет концом охоты. Жертва ранена, притом тяжело. На открытом месте я легко добью ее.

traits.locale_text:
Осколочный карабин извергает струю кристаллических снарядов, что с воем рвутся в плоти Жертвы и вокруг нее. Смертоносная режущая метель украшает улицу кровавым снегом, тела случайных прохожих, угодивших под огонь, валятся наземь. Обычное дело, так живут на шпилях.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
The shardcarbine spews forth a stream of crystalline projectiles that howl and shatter as they pierce the flesh of the Prey. A deadly slashing blizzard drapes the street in bloody snow, the bodies of random passers-by caught in the fire falling to the ground. This is a common occurrence in the spires.
Everyone around me flees from the field of death whose borders I have made clear. The Prey falls but it is still alive. I did not expect the hunt to end with the first salvo. The Prey is badly injured. I can easily finish it off in the open.

languages.text:
シャードカービンは、獲物の肉に突き刺さると唸り声をあげ砕け散る結晶の弾丸を噴出する。恐ろしい猛吹雪により通りは血まみれの雪で覆われ、火に巻き込まれた通行人の死体が無造作に地面に転がっている。尖塔ではよく見られる光景だ。
周囲の誰もが、死の野原から逃げ出す。獲物は倒れたがまだ生きている。最初の一撃で狩りが終わるなど思ってはいなかった。獲物は重傷を負っている。野原で簡単に仕留めることができるだろう。
languages.original_text:
The shardcarbine spews forth a stream of crystalline projectiles that howl and shatter as they pierce the flesh of the Prey. A deadly slashing blizzard drapes the street in bloody snow, the bodies of random passers-by caught in the fire falling to the ground. This is a common occurrence in the spires.
Everyone around me flees from the field of death whose borders I have made clear. The Prey falls but it is still alive. I did not expect the hunt to end with the first salvo. The Prey is badly injured. I can easily finish it off in the open.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
我的碎片卡宾枪喷出一串水晶弹丸，弹丸咆哮着化成碎片，刺穿了猎物的血肉。一场致命的暴风雪，将整个街道笼罩在血红色的“白雪”之中。路人的尸体散落在地上，被烈焰吞没，这样的情形在尖塔非常常见。
我身边的每个人都在拼命逃离死亡的战场。猎物倒在了地上，但还活着。我本以为这场狩猎只要一枪就结束了。不过，猎物总归是受了重伤，我可以轻而易举地把它消灭。
languages.original_text:

A deadly slashing blizzard drapes the street in bloody snow, the bodies of random passers-by caught in the fire falling to the ground. This is a common occurrence in the spires.
Everyone around me flees from the field of death whose borders I have made clear. The Prey falls but it is still alive. I did not expect the hunt to end with the first salvo. The Prey is badly injured. I can easily finish it off in the open.

languages.text:
La carabina cristalina escupe un torrente de proyectiles cristalinos que aúllan y se hacen añicos al atravesar la carne de la presa. Una letal ventisca de esquirlas cubre de sangre la nieve de la calle y los cuerpos de los transeúntes atrapados en la lucha caen al suelo. Esto es algo habitual en las torres.
Todos a mi alrededor huyen del campo de la muerte cuyas fronteras he definido con claridad. La presa cae, pero sigue viva. No esperaba que la caza terminara con los primeros disparos. La presa está malherida. Puedo acabar fácilmente con ella en campo abierto.
languages.original_text:

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Der Splitterkarabiner spuckt einen Strom von kristallinen Projektilen aus, die aufheulen und zerspringen, als sie das Fleisch der Beute durchbohren. Ein tödlicher Blizzard der Schnitte bedeckt die Straße mit blutigem Schnee. Die Leichen von Unbeteiligten, die zufällig in den Feuerhagel geraten, fallen zu Boden. Das geschieht in den Türmen häufig.
Alle um mich herum fliehen von dem Feld des Todes, dessen Grenzen ich klar umrissen habe. Die Beute fällt, lebt jedoch noch. Ich hatte nicht erwartet, dass die Jagd mit der ersten Salve enden würde. Die Beute ist schwer verletzt. Ich kann sie mühelos im Freien erlegen.
languages.original_text:

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Ma carabine éclateuse tire une volée de projectiles cristallins qui hurlent avant de transpercer la chair de la proie. Un blizzard tranchant recouvre la rue d'une neige sanglante alors que des passants innocents se retrouvent pris dans le feu qui s'abat sur le sol. Rien d'extraordinaire dans les tours.
Autour de moi, tout le monde essaie de fuir le champ de mort dont j'ai clairement défini les frontières. La proie est au sol, mais toujours vivante. J'espérais que la traque ne prenne pas fin dès la première salve. La proie est grièvement blessée. Je vais pouvoir l'achever facilement.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Parçakarabinadan büyük bir uğultuyla kristal atışlar yayılıyor, dağılıp Av'ın vücudunu delik deşik ediyorlar. Ölümcül kristal fırtınası sonucu atışlara yakalanan rastgele kimselerin bedenlerinin birer birer yere devrilmesiyle sokak kana boyanıyor. Kulelerde bu olağan bir şeydir.
Çevremdeki herkes, sınırlarını net bir şekilde belli ettiğim ölüm bölgesinden kaçıyor. Avım yere düşüyor ancak hâlâ hayatta. Zaten bu işin ilk salvoda bitmesini beklemiyordum. Avım ağır yaralı. Açıktayken işini kolaylıkla bitirebilirim.
languages.original_text:
The shardcarbine spews forth a stream of crystalline projectiles that howl and shatter as they pierce the flesh of the Prey. A deadly slashing blizzard drapes the street in bloody snow, the bodies of random passers-by caught in the fire falling to the ground. This is a common occurrence in the spires.
Everyone around me flees from the field of death whose borders I have made clear. The Prey falls but it is still alive. I did not expect the hunt to end with the first salvo. The Prey is badly injured. I can easily finish it off in the open.

traits.locale_text:
Parçakarabinadan büyük bir uğultuyla kristal atışlar yayılıyor ve dağılıp Av'ın bedenini deliyorlar. Ölümcül kristal fırtınası sonucu, atışlara yakalanan rastgele kişilerin bedenleri birer birer yere devriliyor ve sokak kana boyanıyor. Kulelerde bu olağan bir şeydir.
Çevremdeki herkes, sınırlarını net bir şekilde belli ettiğim ölüm bölgesinden kaçıyor. Av yere düşüyor ancak hâlâ hayatta. Zaten avın ilk salvoyla bitmesini beklemiyordum. Av ağır yaralı. Açıktayken işini kolaylıkla bitirebilirim.
traits.speaker: Player
